Class Checkmap

  • public class Checkmap
extends java.lang.Object

    CheckMap

    The CheckMap class implements judge function for checking the map whether is a valid map.
    Since:
    2019-02-28
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    jiamin_he, youlin_liu, chenwei_song, shuo_chi, tianshu_ji

        public boolean checkContinent()
        This method checks all continents whether connect with each other.
        Returns:

      • checkCountry

        public boolean checkCountry(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> countryList)
        This method checks all countries in same continent whether connect with each other.
        Parameters:
        countryList - The list stores all countries which are in the same continent.
        Returns:
        true if all countries are connected, otherwise return false.

      • findAdjList

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> findAdjList(Continent continent)
        This method aims at finding current continent's neighbor continent.
        Parameters:
        continent - it is a continent
        Returns:
        A list stores all continents which are neighbor of the current continent.
